channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Tree Fire; INC#1542; 07:53PM; 6700 W Hillpark Dr; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3WyAFkA" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3WyAFkA</a>; #HollywoodHills; Crews on the ground declared a knockdown on the initial dumpster fire, as well as the palm trees on fire. Blue flames were initially observed in the dumpster, later determined to be caused by electrical wire and conduit. LAFD HazMat experts state there is no further threat to the surrounding area.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 BC5 E76 E86 SQ21; CH7; 14; Lyndsey Lantz

Hiker Rescue; INC#1491; 07:20PM; 2469 N Solar Dr; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4bxAKt2" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4bxAKt2</a>; #HollywoodHillsWest; A 35yo male hiker sustained injuries secondary to a 15-foot fall in a remote area of Runyon Canyon. Crews on the ground and in the air coordinated to locate and assist the patient, who was able to walk down the trail and meet an LAFD paramedic ambulance for treatment and transport to a local hospital; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 BC5 E227 E41 H1 H4 HA1 HA4 RA41 RA827 RH114 T27 UR27; CH7; 12; Lyndsey Lantz

Tree Fire; INC#1542; 07:53PM; 6700 W Hillpark Dr; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3WyAFkA" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3WyAFkA</a>; #HollywoodHills; First arriving companies report flames from a dumpster that caught palm trees on fire. The Highland Avenue offramp from the southbound 101 will be closed while companies coordinate efforts to extinguish the fire; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; E76; CH7; 14; Lyndsey Lantz

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1420; 06:24PM; 1858 N Av 53; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3UTx93b" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3UTx93b</a>; #HighlandPark; Fire was extinguished in 30 minutes by first arriving companies, with no extension of the fire beyond attic and roof involvement. No injuries were reported; the cause remains under investigation.; FS 55; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E12 E212 E250 E42 E55 RA12 RA55 T12 T50; CH9; 12; Lyndsey Lantz

Structure Fire; INC#1420; 06:24PM; 1858 N Av 53; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3UTx93b" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3UTx93b</a>; #HighlandPark; Companies in the area spotted light smoke coming from the attic of an one-story single family dwelling set on a hillside. Firefighters are in the "offensive" mode, making entry and actively containing fire.; FS 55; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; E55 RA55; CH4; Lyndsey Lantz

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0458; 08:57AM; 1557 N Harvard Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4bsaDnp" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4bsaDnp</a>; #EastHollywood; 52 firefighters spent 19 minutes confining and extinguishing flames in the attic of this single family dwelling. Crews remain on scene for overhaul and salvage operations. No injuries reported; nothing further.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC5 E227 E35 E41 E52 RA52 RA82 SO1 T27 T35; CH9; 12; Lyndsey Lantz

Structure Fire; INC#0458; 08:57AM; 1557 N Harvard Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4bsaDnp" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4bsaDnp</a>; #EastHollywood; First arriving companies report a single family dwelling with heavy smoke showing from what appears to be the attic space. Lower floors are clear. Companies are currently mounting a coordinated fire attack.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC5 E227 E35 E41 E52 RA52 RA82 T27 T35; CH9; 12; Lyndsey Lantz

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1656; 08:11PM; 235 S Berendo St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3wulJJH" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3wulJJH</a>; #Koreatown; It took 57 firefighters just 15 minutes to extinguish all flames on the second floor of a 3-story, 24-unit apartment building constructed in 1927. The fire was contained to a single unit, with surrounding units protected from any fire extension. No injuries were reported, though all 24 units have been evacuated after residents initially sheltered in place. Berendo Street and 3rd Street will be closed to traffic in the vicinity for approximately one hour. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC14 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E203 E211 E220 E229 E27 E29 E52 E6 EM11 HR3 RA6 RA806 RA813 SQ21 T11 T20 T29 T3 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 14; Lyndsey Lantz

Structure Fire; INC#1656; 08:11PM; 235 S Berendo St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3wulJJH" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3wulJJH</a>; #Koreatown; Initial arriving companies report a 3-story apartment building with units surrounding a center hallway; fire is showing from one unit on the second floor. Crews will be in the offensive mode, actively fighting fire and searching for any persons that need rescue.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC5 E11 E211 E229 E52 E6 RA6 RA813 T11 T29; CH9; 14; Lyndsey Lantz

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Semi-trailer Collision and Fire 05/08/2024 INC#0797

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Semi-trailer Collision and Fire; INC#0797; 12:17PM; SB 5 x 405; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3Ux2lUy" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3Ux2lUy</a>; #GranadaHills; 80 firefighters spent 38 minutes in a coordinated effort to confine and extinguish flames in one of two semi-trailers involved in this collision on the southbound 5 Freeway, just north of the 405 transition. One male driver successfully escaped his burning cab, and passing motorists stopped to help extinguish the flames on his clothes and body. Upon LAFD arrival, he was transported by rescue ambulance to a local trauma center with critical burns. No other injuries or patients were reported, as the other semi-trailer was parked on the shoulder with no occupants at the time of the collision. While foam was used to extinguish the fire, fuel and oil runoff was contained to the immediate area and then remediated, preventing any further threat to immediate surroundings or storm drains. Media inquiries: CHP Log 1309. ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC731 CM40 CM42 E18 E275 E287 E290 E75 E77 E88 E91 E98 EM12 EM14 H1 HA1 JT1 JT2 PI4 RA18 RA87 RA90 RA91 SO1 SQ21 SQ87 T75 T87 T90 T98 WT77 WT88; CH8; 17; Lyndsey Lantz
